message.raw:
Resolve issue #25 by adding a delete keyboard shortcut to delete shots.
Delete alone prompts for confirmation, shift+delete does not prompt.

Move stylesheet to central widget instead of main window, so that dialog
boxes do not inherit it. Flat buttons in dialog popups looks silly.

message:
